data.lyric:
[ti:Into the Unknown (From "Frozen 2"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Idina Menzel/Aurora]
[al:Frozen 2 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Into the Unknown - Idina Menzel/AURORA (奥罗拉)
[00:00.90]Lyrics by：Kristen Anderson-Lopez/Robert Lopez
[00:01.81]Composed by：Kristen Anderson-Lopez/Robert Lopez
[00:02.72]Ah ah oh oh
[00:09.47]Ah ah oh oh
[00:14.32]Ah ah oh oh oh oh
[00:17.78]I can hear you but I won't
[00:22.05]Some look for trouble while others don't
[00:26.90]There's a thousand reasons I should go about my day
[00:31.49]And ignore your whispers which I wish would go away oh oh
[00:40.64]Oh oh
[00:41.80]Ah ah oh oh
[00:44.89]You're not a voice
[00:47.06]You're just a ringing in my ear
[00:49.45]And if I heard you which I don't
[00:52.23]I'm spoken for I fear
[00:54.95]Everyone I've ever loved is here within these walls
[00:59.22]I'm sorry secret siren but I'm blocking out your calls
[01:03.73]I've had my adventure I don't need something new
[01:08.10]I'm afraid of what I'm risking if I follow you
[01:12.05]Into the unknown
[01:16.49]Into the unknown
[01:21.11]Into the unknown
[01:27.37]Ah ah oh oh
[01:31.78]Ah ah oh oh oh
[01:35.16]What do you want 'Cause you've been keeping me awake
[01:40.27]Are you here to distract me so I make a big mistake
[01:46.42]Or are you someone out there who's a little bit like me
[01:52.36]Who knows deep down I'm not where I'm meant to be
[01:59.18]Every day's a little harder as I feel my power grow
[02:03.96]Don't you know there's part of me that longs to go
[02:09.42]Into the unknown
[02:13.92]Into the unknown
[02:18.41]Into the unknown
[02:22.36]Ah ah oh oh
[02:24.49]Ah ah oh oh
[02:26.32]Oh oh oh
[02:28.17]Are you out there
[02:29.30]Do you know me
[02:30.43]Can you feel me
[02:31.40]Can you show me
[02:34.61]Ah ah oh oh
[02:36.80]Ah ah oh oh
[02:38.93]Ah ah oh oh
[02:42.32]Ah ah oh oh
[02:44.52]Oh oh oh oh
[02:46.79]Oh oh oh oh
[02:49.02]Oh oh oh oh
[02:53.01]Where are you going
[02:54.84]Don't leave me alone
[02:57.27]How do I follow you
[03:02.73]Into the unknown
data.trans:
[ti:探索未知 (From "Frozen 2"/Soundtrack Version)]
[ar:Idina Menzel/Aurora]
[al:Frozen 2 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.90]//
[00:01.81]//
[00:02.72]//
[00:09.47]//
[00:14.32]//
[00:17.78]我可以听你说 但我不会听从你
[00:22.05]有些人想找麻烦 而有人不会
[00:26.90]千万个理由告诉我 我应该追寻自己想要的生活
[00:31.49]无视众人的窃窃私语 我多希望那些声音能全部消失
[00:40.64]//
[00:41.80]//
[00:44.89]你并不是什么至理名言
[00:47.06]你只能被我当成耳边风
[00:49.45]虽然我没有听到你说了什么 但即使我真的听到
[00:52.23]我也早已表明了我的立场
[00:54.95]我所爱的人都在我的舒适圈里
[00:59.22]那呼唤我的声音啊 很抱歉我会将其隔绝
[01:03.73]我曾有过冒险 而我现在不需要任何新鲜趣闻
[01:08.10]我好害怕我会因为追随那些呼唤而失去些什么
[01:12.05]探索未知
[01:16.49]探索未知
[01:21.11]探索未知
[01:27.37]//
[01:31.78]//
[01:35.16]你想要什么 你总是让我不得安宁
[01:40.27]你是不是想扰乱我的心 让我犯下大错
[01:46.42]还是说你只是某些地方和我有点相像的人？
[01:52.36]某个深知我所在的地方不是我真正归属的人？
[01:59.18]我能感受到你的声音越来越大 而每天都过得愈来愈艰辛
[02:03.96]难道你知道其实我心底已有离开这里的渴望？
[02:09.42]探索未知
[02:13.92]探索未知
[02:18.41]探索未知
[02:22.36]//
[02:24.49]//
[02:26.32]//
[02:28.17]你还在那儿吗
[02:29.30]你了解我吗
[02:30.43]你理解我吗
[02:31.40]你能否证明给我看
[02:34.61]//
[02:36.80]//
[02:38.93]//
[02:42.32]//
[02:44.52]//
[02:46.79]//
[02:49.02]//
[02:53.01]你要去哪里
[02:54.84]不要丢下我
[02:57.27]我该怎样跟随你
[03:02.73]探索未知
